TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract HttpWorkerRequest extends System.Object

summary.span: 這個抽象類別定義 ASP.NET Managed 程式碼處理要求所使用的基底背景工作方法和列舉類型 (Enumeration)。

span.span: This abstract class defines the base worker methods and enumerations used by ASP.NET managed code to process requests.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在大部分情況下，您的程式碼將不會處理直接因為要求和回應資料會透過公開和類別。In most cases, your code will not deal with directly because request and response data are exposed through the and classes. 某些內部 ASP.NET 類別會擴充此類別。Some internal ASP.NET classes extend this class. 如果您的程式碼會實作自己的裝載環境，它將需要擴充此類別來呼叫方法。If your code implements its own hosting environment, it will need to extend this class to call the method. 此外，您的程式碼可以建立衍生的類別內指定的應用程式，才能將傳遞其執行個體的子要求執行為了。In addition, your code could create a derived class for the purpose of child-request execution within a given application in order to pass its instance to . 在此情況下，衍生的類別應該保留目前的參考和委派大部分給它的方法。In this case, the derived class should keep a reference to the current and delegate most of the methods to it.

remarks.format: ## Remarks ASP.NET 要求執行含有對應的 IIS 要求相同的追蹤識別碼。ASP.NET requests execute with the same trace ID as the corresponding IIS request. 這有助於追蹤其整個存留期，開頭為 HTTP 要求。SYS 核心模式 HTTP 接聽程式，透過 IIS 服務，並於 ASP.NET 系統。This facilitates tracking a request throughout its lifetime, starting with the HTTP.SYS kernel-mode HTTP listener, through the IIS service, and into the ASP.NET system. IIS 所提供的識別碼而有所不同的平台和 service pack 層級。The IDs provided by IIS differ based on the platform and service pack level.
